technologies.description: Erlang is a general-purpose, concurrent, functional programming language, and a garbage-collected runtime system.

technologies.name: Cowboy

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.
